name: Little Defender
description:
Created For the Gdevelop Game Jam 2

 Story

While Wandering The Wood.

You Found a Cute Little Lizard Thing, You Name Him Bitey. 

You Decide To Keep Him As a Pet, That when Zombie Started Appearing. 

Now You Must Survive The Undead Horde With The Help Of Your New Pet.

Can You Survive The Undead Horde For 5 Minute??

How To Play

Control: 

WASD Is To Move: A: Left , S: Down , W: Up , D: Right. 

Left Click On Enemy To Make Bitey Attack. 

Right Click To Throw Pet Food. 

Tip : 

Make that Your Pet Health Doesn't Hit Zero or Bitey Will Asleep For a Couple Second. 

Throwing Food at Bitey Will Give Him 5 Health and Throwing Food While He Asleep Will Wake Him Up. 

Don't throw Food at Zombie Or it will go to Wasted(The Food Will do Nothing to The Zombie And Get Delete).
